feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-10-26T19:45:36.825043Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;75% 的专有硬木可能被非法采伐</stitle>; <id>;https://www.chalmers.se/en/current/news/75-percent-of-exclusive -hardwood-may-be-illegally-harvested,c3863187/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T14:45:32.059357Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.chalmers.se/en /current/news/75-percent-of-exclusive-hardwood-may-be-illegally-harvested,c3863187/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;geox</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=geox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://mb.cision.com/Public/5569/3861158/880b567807b5dc02_800x800ar.jpg" style= “宽度：220px；高度：124px;" />;<br />;根据查尔姆斯理工大学的一项研究，来自巴西最大产区的 ipê 超过四分之三可能是非法采伐的。该研究揭示了非法采伐的风险以及采取反制措施的必要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#75-percent-of-exclusive-hardwood-may-be-illegally-harvested" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38025998" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OpenAI 准备挑战</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/form/preparedness-challenge< /id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T18:45:32.062576Z</更新>; <link href="https://openai.com/form/preparedness-challenge"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dougb5</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dougb5</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://openai.com/social /facebook.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;截至 2023 年 12 月 31 日，我们将滚动接受回复。我们将为最多 10 名提交的热门作品提供每人 25,000 美元的 API 积分，发布新颖的想法和参赛作品，并寻找候选人表彰本次挑战赛中顶尖竞争者的准备情况。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openai-preparedness-challenge" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38029307" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;I2P：端到端加密和匿名互联网</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/PurpleI2P/i2pd</id >; <更新>;2023-10-26T15:45:32.063746Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/PurpleI2P/i2pd"/>; <作者>; <name>;keepamovin</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/1cc41fc478bcb69d56c259ffd63bf604f0ffa4962a923fb6fe634a5219979d93/PurpleI2P /i2pd" style="宽度: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;I2P（隐形互联网协议）是一个通用的匿名网络层。所有通过 I2P 的通信都是匿名且端到端加密的，参与者不会透露自己的真实 IP 地址。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i2p-end-to-end-encrypted-and-anonymous-internet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38026736" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;冷战卫星图像揭示了数百个未知的罗马堡垒</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/oct/26/ Cold-war-satellite-images-hundreds-unknown-roman-forts</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45:32.064305Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com /science/2023/oct/26/cold-war-satellite-images-hundreds-unknown-roman-forts"/>; <作者>; <名称>;BerislavLopac</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=BerislavLopac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/0100b9990bfc29ecac1592ae2d3679ca6a303093/0_738_1594_956/master/1594 .png?width=465&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px;高度：132px;" />;<br />;解密的冷战间谍卫星图像揭示了叙利亚和伊拉克数百个以前未被发现的罗马堡垒，挑战了之前关于罗马边境的假设。这些堡垒不是防线的一部分，而是相反支持跨境贸易和通讯。这一发现表明罗马世界的边界比以前认为的更加流动和包容。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cold-war-satellite- images-reveal-hundreds-of-unknown-roman-forts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38024665" target= "_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;附近-地球小行星是月球的一块</stitle>; <id>;https://www.spacechatter.com/2023/10/25/moon-fragment-near-earth-asteroid-kamooalewa/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T16:45:32.065496Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.spacechatter.com/2023/10/25/moon-fragment-near-earth-asteroid-kamooalewa/"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;Brajeshwar</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://www.spacechatter.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/AdobeStock_483042151-1024x558.jpeg”样式=“宽度：220px；高度：120px;" />;<br />;亚利桑那大学的天文学家发现了证据，表明一颗名为 Kamo'oalewa 的近地小行星可能是月球的碎片。这一发现挑战了之前关于近地小行星起源的假设。地球小行星可能对我们了解靠近地球的天体产生重大影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#near-earth-asteroid-is-a-chunk-of-the-月亮" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38027533" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MAME（街机模拟器）中的合成器模拟。新趋势？ </stitle>; <id>;https://gearspace.com/board/computer-music-instruments-and-computer-music-products/1416192-synth-emulation-mame-arcade-machine-emulator-new-trend。 html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45:32.066415Z</更新>; <link href="https://gearspace.com/board/electronic-music-instruments-and-electronic-music-product /1416192-synth-emulation-mame-arcade-machine-emulator-new-trend.html"/>; <author>; <name>;bane</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =bane</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gearspace.com/board/attachments/featured-content/1079365-audix-pdx720-signature-edition-dynamic -麦克风-技术-艺术-未命名-2023-08-10t104321.920.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;模拟和仿真是复制系统的两种不同方法。模拟侧重于复制最终结果，而仿真侧重于复制过程。MAME（街机模拟器）旨在准确模拟街机的内部工作原理和操作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#synth-emulation-in-mame-arcade-machine-emulator-a-new-trend" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38025125" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;矢量化宽 PyTorch 表达式时会发生什么？</stitle>; <id>;https://也许marcus.com/blocks/2023/10/19/vectorizing-wide-pytorch-expressions.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45:32.067299Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /probouslymarcus.com/blocks/2023/10/19/vectorizing-wide-pytorch-expressions.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mrcslws</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=mrcslws</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://probouslymarcus.com/images/2023-10-19-tree.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：118px;" />;<br />;马库斯·刘易斯 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-happens-when-you-vectorize-wide-pytorch-expressions" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38025381" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;移动优先网页设计对桌面的负面影响</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.nngroup.com/articles/content-分散/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T14:45:32.068565Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nngroup.com/文章/内容分散/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;skadamat </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skadamat</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型= “html”>;<img src =“https://media.nngroup.com/media/editor/2023/10/06/hermanmiller.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 149px;" />;<br />;移动优先的网页设计在桌面上查看时会导致严重的可用性问题。内容在长滚动页面上变得过于分散，具有广阔的空白空间以及放大的图像和字体，使用户难以消费并理解这些信息。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-negative-impact-of-mobile-first-web-design-on-desktop" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38025767" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C 静态分析工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/analysis-tools- dev/static-analysis</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T11:45:32.069621Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/analysis-tools-dev/static-analysis"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;Alifatisk</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Alifatisk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/48246447/dfcde824-f255-4366-83c8-c901b9c19975”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;此存储库列出了所有编程语言的静态分析工具、构建工具、配置文件等。重点是提高代码质量的工具，例如 linter 和格式化程序。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#static-analysis-tools-for-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=38024002" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;Oxide：云计算机</stitle>; <id>;https://oxygen.computer/blog/the-cloud-computer</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T11:45:32.070509Z </更新>; <link href="https://oxygen.computer/blog/the-cloud-computer"/>; <作者>; <name>;CathalMullan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=CathalMullan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://oxygen.computer/og/blog/the-cloud-computer.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 116px;" />;<br />;Oxide宣布推出全球首台商用云计算机，可以购买而不是租用。云计算机的开发需要机架级方法和协同设计硬件和软件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#oxy-the-cloud-computer" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38023891" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AirportSim</stitle>; <id>;https://airportsim.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T15:45:32.071304Z</更新>; <link href="https://airportsim.com/"/>; <作者>; <name>;skibz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skibz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://airportsim.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Logo_AirportSim_Poziom_Bialy-1.png" style="width: 220px;高度：90px;" />;<br />;AirportSim 是一款来自高级独立游戏领域的现代模拟器，可让您扮演机场地勤人员的角色。逼真的图形、逼真的机场模型和动态天气条件将提供真正的机场停机坪的设置。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#airportsim" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38026308" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hysteria 是一个强大、快速且抗审查的代理</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/apernet/hysteria</id>; <updated>;2023- 10-26T15:45:32.072129Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/apernet/hysteria"/>; <author>; <name>;keepamovin</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/45e7eecd8bfe609d46d31e03bbae932dc2a1b71e84589acd47f0eb49e8b8b5fa/68747470733a2f2f61 70692e737461722d686973746f72792e636f6d2f7376673f7265706f733d617065726e65742f687973746572696126747970653d44617465”样式=“宽度： 220 像素； height: 147px;" />;<br />;Hysteria 是一款功能强大、快速且抗审查的代理。它提供了广泛的模式和功能，包括 SOCKS5、HTTP 代理、TCP/UDP 转发和 Linux TProxy。通过自定义 QUIC 协议，并在不可靠的网络上提供无与伦比的性能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hysteria-is-a-powerful-fast-and-censorship-pressive-proxy" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38026756" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Verto.sh：连接初学者与开源项目的新中心</stitle>; <id>;https://www.verto.sh/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T12:45:32.073929Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.verto.sh/" />; <author>; <name>;lucavallin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lucavallin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://www.verto.sh/meta.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Verto.sh 通过策划可访问的项目，简化您进入开源世界的过程。非常适合做出首次贡献的初学者、组建团队的创始人以及寻求新贡献者的维护者。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#verto-sh-a-new-hub-connecting-beginners-with-open-source-projects” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38024456" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧盟议会希望取消聊天控制并保障安全加密</stitle>; <id>;https://www.patrick-breyer.de/en /关于儿童性虐待提案的历史性协议-csar-european-parliament-wants-to-remove-chat-c​​ontrol-and-safeguard-secure-encryption/</id>; <更新>;2023-10- 26T16:45:32.074739Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.patrick-breyer.de/en/historic-agreement-on-child- Sex-abuse-proposal-csar-european-parliament-wants -to-remove-chat-c​​ontrol-and-safeguard-secure-encryption/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;teichmann</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=teichmann< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.patrick-breyer.de/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/en-1.png" style= “宽度：220px； height: 123px;" />;<br />;欧洲议会已就欧盟聊天控制法案的共同立场达成多数协议。该立场取消了不分青红皂白的聊天控制，并允许对涉嫌与该法案有联系的个人和团体进行有针对性的监视儿童性虐待材料，并有司法令。端到端加密信使不受限制。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eu-parliament-wants-to-remove-chat-c​​ontrol- and-safeguard-secure-encryption" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38027346" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;瑟斯顿摩尔重温他的索尼克青春< /stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/10/23/books/review/thurston-moore-sonic-life.html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45： 32.075579Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/10/23/books/review/thurston-moore-sonic-life.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tintinnabula </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tintinnabula</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt .com/images/2023/11/05/books/review/23moore/23moore-facebookJumbo.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：116px;" />;<br />;瑟斯顿·摩尔 (Thurston Moore) 是艺术噪音乐队 Sonic Youth 的推动者，他在回忆录《Sonic》中回顾了自己的童年、早年在曼哈顿市中心的生活以及在音乐行业的经历生活。'当摩尔听到 Kingsmen 的歌曲《Louie Louie》时，他顿悟了，他形容乐队的现场表演响亮而有力。回忆录还探讨了摩尔与 Kim Gordon 的关系、Sonic Youth 的成立以及他们在音乐上的成功。行业。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thurston-moore-revisits-his-sonic-youth" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38007547" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;希尔伯特曲线：用 JavaScript 绘制的著名空间填充曲线</stitle>; <id>;http://jsxgraph.uni-bayreuth.de/wiki/index.php /Hilbert_curve</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45:32.076639Z</更新>; <link href="http://jsxgraph.uni-bayreuth.de/wiki/index.php/Hilbert_curve"/>; <author>; <name>;susam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=susam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;著名的空间填充曲线用 JavaScript 绘制。如果将其设置为 level=9，则曲线由 262 144 个点定义 - 因此，如果您使用 Internet Explorer，请小心。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hilbert-curve-the-known-space-filling-curve-drawn-with-javascript" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38024418" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如果互联网中断，Synology MFA 会失败</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alexfromapex</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;嗨！欢迎加入我们的 Synology 社区。一个可以解答您所有 Synology 问题的地方。立即提出问题或开始讨论。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#synology-mfa-fails-if-internet-is-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38012494" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MetaCLIP – 元人工智能研究</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/facebookresearch/MetaCLIP</id >; <更新>;2023-10-26T09:45:32.078888Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/facebookresearch/MetaCLIP"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zerojames</名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zerojames</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/70e172bd86988364052ee06d04084ade28723621b2489d31150a8f2b3c1645a3/facebookresearch /MetaCLIP" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;此存储库包含 MetaCLIP 的代码，它使用简单的算法来管理 CLIP 数据。主要贡献是：从头开始管理数据，而不通过先前的模型进行过滤，这是一种在数据管道，以及用于受控实验和公平比较的标准 CLIP 训练设置。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#metaclip-meta-ai-research" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38023544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;华盛顿大学的肾结石突破手术被称为患者的“游戏规则改变者”</stitle>; <id>;https://komonews .com/news/local/uw-medicine-kidney-stone-breakthrough-procedure-treatment-nasa-mars-astronaut-research-患者-game-changer-seattle-clinical-triking-harborview-medical-center</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T14:45:32.079781Z</更新>; <link href="https://komonews.com/news/local/uw-medicine-kidney-stone-breakthrough-procedure-treatment-nasa- mars-astronaut-research-病人-game-changer-seattle-clinical-trial-harborview-medical-center"/>; <作者>; <名称>;elorant</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=elorant</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://komonews.com/resources/media2/16x9/full/1015/center/80/faf9c2d8- d15b-460b-8ebd-43edffefcf44-large16x9_1.JPG"样式=“宽度：220px；高度：124px;" />;<br />;华盛顿大学很快将提供突破性的肾结石医疗手术。该手术称为爆波碎石术，使用超声波和声波来分解肾结石，从而缓解肾结石的症状。 10 分钟或更短。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kidney-stone-breakthrough-procedure-at-uw- Called-game-changer-for-病人" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38026119" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;较慢的紧迫性</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bayoakomolafe.net/post/ a-slower-urgency</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T17:45:32.080349Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bayoakomolafe.net/post/a-slower-urgency"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;ingve</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://assets.website-files.com/608ecfe9c11b33f3bdf3052c/60eef9ce76c7f376371ae5cd_dynamic-wang-EOg71lgcGLU-unsplash.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;放慢脚步的目的不是为了得到答案，而是为了质疑我们的问题。这是为了留在闹鬼的地方。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#a-slower-urgency" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Oh-Auth – 滥用 OAuth 接管数百万帐户</stitle>; <id>;https://salt.security/blog/oh-auth-abusing-oauth-接管数百万账户</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T05:45:32.080913Z</更新>; <link href="https://salt.security/blog/oh-auth -abusing-oauth-to-take-over-millions-of-accounts"/>; <author>; <name>;skilled</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skilled</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/6334717ca56db62653270dc5/646ce626ecfd5a664568bb0b_6400a42bdd101731edd18d10_2.png" style="width: 220px; height: 140px;" />;<br />;黑客可以接管 Grammarly、Vidio 和 Bukalapak 上的数百万个帐户。该问题已得到解决，但其他网站的用户仍可能面临风险。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#oh-auth-abusing-oauth-to-take-over-millions-of-accounts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=38009291" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;钠电池提供了棘手的锂电池的替代品</stitle>; <id>;https://www.economist.com/leaders/2023/10/26/sodium-batteries-offer -an-alternative-to-tricky-lithium</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45:32.082606Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.economist.com/leaders/2023/ 10/26/sodium-batteries-offer-an-alternative-to-tricky-lithium"/>; <author>; <name>;edward</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=爱德华</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.economist.com/cdn-cgi/image/width=1424,quality=80,format=auto/内容资产/图像/20231028_LDD003.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;向低碳电力的绿色转型需要大量电池，其中锂离子电池是主导技术。然而，对锂稀缺性和对中国提炼的依赖的担忧导致了人们对钠电池作为替代品产生了兴趣。钠比锂更丰富且更便宜，并且钠电池可以使用丰富且无争议的材料作为其电极。虽然钠电池可能比锂离子电池更重并且启动较晚，它们提供了一条实现能源安全和节省成本的潜在途径。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sodium-batteries-offer-an-alternative-to-tricky-lithium" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38025086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;《城市天际线 2》在 Nvidia RTX4090 上以 20fps 运行</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.dsogaming.com/pc-performance-analysiss/cities-skylines-2-runs-with-20fps-on-an-nvidia-rtx4090-at-4k-high-even-on-an-empty-map/< /id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T18:45:32.083167Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dsogaming.com/pc-performance-analysiss/cities-skylines-2-runs-with -20fps-on-an-nvidia-rtx4090-at-4k-high-even-on-an-empty-map/"/>; <author>; <name>;segasaturn</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=segasaturn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.dsogaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/城市天际线-2-feature-3-672x372.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 122px;" />;<br />;Paradox Interactive 发布了《城市天际线 2》，但它是 2023 年优化最差的 PC 游戏之一，在 NVIDIA RTX4090 上以 20fps 运行。该游戏没有利用光线追踪技术或路径追踪，即使在空地图上，它也很难保持流畅的性能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cities-skylines-2-runs-with-20fps-on-an -nvidia-rtx4090" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38029479" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;制作原版《超级马里奥兄弟》的人发行了 Wonder 38 年后</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gamesradar.com/5-people-made-the-original-super-mario-bros-all-of-them-were-still-at-nintendo- to-ship-wonder-38-years-later/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T10:45:32.083805Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.gamesradar.com/5-人们制作了原版超级马里奥兄弟，他们所有人仍然在任天堂 38 年后发布奇迹/“/>; <作者>; <名称>;IMS </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=IMS</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos .cms.futurecdn.net/eTccUEStxrwUJKvwtteih3-320-80.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;NES 上最初的《超级马里奥兄弟》是由五个人的团队制作的，38 年后，这五个人仍然在《超级马里奥兄弟奇迹》中得到认可。这是一个令人难以置信的作品游戏史上开发者连续性的壮举。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#people-who-made-the-original-super-mario-bros-shipped-wonder-38-years-later" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38023580" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英国政府因废除生物识别保障措施而被指控“破坏公物”</stitle>; <id>;https://therecord.media/uk-government-criticized-over-abolishing-ai-biometric-safeguards</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T13:45:32.084478Z</更新>; <link href ="https://therecord.media/uk-government-criticized-over-abolishing-ai-biometric-safeguards"/>; <作者>; <名称>;CTOSian</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=CTOSian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.therecord.media/uploads/headshot_79eb085f87.jpeg?w=3840" style= “宽度：220px；高度：221px;" />;<br />;英国政府取消生物识别和公共空间监控保障措施的计划被即将离任的专员批评为“令人震惊”和“等同于破坏公物”。这是在政府取消监督之际进行的机制并废除有关使用生物识别技术的多项保障措施。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#uk-government-accused-of-vandalism-over-abolishing-biometrics-safeguards" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38025200" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jina AI 推出开源 8k 文本嵌入</stitle>; <id>;https:// /jina.ai/news/jina-ai-launches-worlds-first-open-source-8k-text-embedding-rivaling-openai/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-26T00:45:32.084992Z</已更新>; <link href="https://jina.ai/news/jina-ai-launches-worlds-first-open-source-8k-text-embedding-rivaling-openai/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; artex_xh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=artex_xh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://huggingface. co/favicon.ico" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Jina AI推出第二代文本嵌入模型jina-embeddings-v2，支持8K上下文长度，可与OpenAI的text-embedding-ada-002模型相媲美。在各个领域都优于 OpenAI 同行。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jina-ai-launches-open-source-8k-text-embedding" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38020109" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
